Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with fully equipped kitchen, fireplace, iron/ironing board, digital LCD TV 26’’, DVD player, wired and wireless internet access, luxury personal care products, magnifying mirror in the bathroom.
Exactly on the beach of Lechaio. Within short driving distance from several places of archaeological and cultural interest: Ancient Corinth, Canal of Isthmus, Mycenae, Epidaurus etc
